title: Person of Interest - My name is Harold, and this is a thermonuclear weapon (05x13)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: "I like this new side of you, Finch. It's terrifying, but...I like it." LOL

John: Your heart rate monitor looks like a FitBit
Harold: The macine doesn't think i get enough exercise.. 
One of the best things about POI was their ability to inject humor into desparate situations.

I loved this scene, John's look on he's face was so funny. What the hell are you saying Finch?  In life you don't Q Finch's motives. Is he telling the truth or bluffing. Well the machine had to tell John to take gas mask and sleeping gas with them. There are so many holes in the last season you could make 3 more seasons easy.       Chirp
You know that an AI is dangerous if it has a sense of humor
Haha, you have to love John's "What The F***?" face at 0:35
description:
- Extract from season 5 episode 13
